  • Type Parameters:
    T - The dropdown entry type.

    public class WidgetTextFieldDropdown<T>
extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.component.input.WidgetTextFieldExtended
    A text field that can show a dropdown for autocomplete.
